author: Source: KION 46
title: Dow Jones denies it was hacked for trading tips - KION 46
text:
The owner of The Wall Street Journal denied a report on Friday from a rival news organization that hackers had infiltrated its servers to hunt for trading tips. Dow Jones, which owns the Journal, said it has received "no information" from authorities about "any such alleged matter."
Start the conversation, or Read more at KION 46.
